body: Right now on Wild West I am playing with 3 people on my team. There's 1 person left, but the compass says "Spawn" when I follow it. Plz help
body_tagged: Right now on Wild West I am playing with 3 people on my team. There's 1 person left, but the compass says "Spawn" when I follow it. Plz help
title: Glitches on walls

replies.body: Probably a bug. Take screenshots and bring it to Github. If you don't have an account, I think it'll be fixed soon when a developer sees this post.
replies.body_tagged: Probably a bug. Take screenshots and bring it to Github. If you don't have an account, I think it'll be fixed soon when a developer sees this post.
